mapper.insert: insert into order_info(kill_id, phone, pay_status, status) values(#{killId}, #{phone}, #{payStatus}, 1);
mapper.select: SELECT kill_id, phone, pay_status FROM order_info WHERE kill_id = #{killId} and phone = #{phone};
SELECT kill_id, phone, pay_status FROM order_info WHERE STATUS = 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE order_info SET pay_status = '已支付' WHERE kill_id = #{killId} and phone = #{phone};
UPDATE order_info SET status = 0 WHERE kill_id = #{killId} and phone = #{phone};
